questions.quote: Yeah, I grabbed it on the way out, I don't want my mother reading it.
Oh yeah. He'd hold national security meetings in there. He planned the Hanoi bombing after a bad Thai meal.
I lived with him for forty years, I never saw him trying on my underwear. As soon as he leaves the house, he turns into J. Edgar Hoover!
My censor quit two years ago. He checked into a clinic. Emotionally exhausted.
Hey, if you two are meant to be together...I'm sure the cops'll pick her up on something.
I'll pay you for your time....I just ..I just need some information . How much do you want? ten....fifteen? You have change for twenty?
Well, I can see that. What do you have to do that for? Who cares about your pants size?
Ah, I'll just take the fire escape to get in and out of the building.
I wonder what happened to my fiancé.  I know he's here somewhere. Ellen?  Have you seen my fiancé?
Alright, this one is about 8 years old. Not a scratch on it, it was owned by some lady who only used it to go from the bathroom to the kitchen and to feed her cat.
